items.name: 12 Dry Rub Wings
items.description: Your choice of 1 or 2 sauces. Comes with blue cheese or ranch.

flame_grilled_burgers.note: All hand pattied burgers served with fries, tots, or homemade chips! Add lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickle for no extra charge. Upgrade your side for an additional cost.

items.name: Granville Burger
items.description: Our famous burger with our signature Granville sauce on the side | Add cheese for an additional $1.00

items.name: Bacon Cheddar
items.description: Cheddar cheese, apple wood smoked bacon, our signature Granville sauce.

items.name: Rajun' Cajun
items.description: Cajun seasoned topped with pepper jack cheese, our house made spicy mayo.

items.name: Bacon Blue
items.description: Melted blue cheese, apple wood smoked bacon, and our signature Granville sauce.

items.name: Charlie
items.description: Smothered in our homemade steak sauce, sautéed mushrooms & onions topped with melted swiss cheese.

items.name: Bourbon Bacon Jam
items.description: Smothered with our homemade bourbon jam, two slices of applewood smoked bacon, cheddar cheese, and homemade coleslaw.

items.name: Kiss Me Now Maybe Later Garlic Burger
items.description: Our famous hand-pattied burger on a grilled brioche bun topped with grilled tomato and garlic aioli.

items.name: Tijuana
items.description: Topped with homemade queso, jalapeño peppers, homemade fried shoestring onions, and spicy mayo.

items.name: Impossible Burger (V)
items.description: Plant based burger with our signature Granville sauce.

salads.name: House Salad
salads.description: Mixed greens topped with tomatoes, red onion, carrots, cucumber, shredded cheese, and house made croutons. Served with your choice of dressing.

salads.name: Grilled Wedge Salad (V)
salads.description: Grilled romaine wedge topped with corn medley and feta cheese. Served with Caesar dressing
salads.options: Add protein - 3oz salmon filet or 8oz chicken breast +$4.00

salads.name: Chef Salad
salads.description: Kentucky smoked ham and turkey, applewood smoked bacon, tomatoes, red onion, carrots, cucumber, croutons, and shredded cheese over a bed of mixed greens and your choice of dressing.

salads.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
salads.description: Mixed greens, tomato, cucumbers, onion, carrots, cheddar cheese, and croutons. Topped with your choice of grilled or rajun cajun chicken and your choice of dressing.

salads.name: Crispy Buffalo Chicken Salad
salads.description: Mixed greens, tomato, cucumbers, onion, carrots, cheddar cheese, and croutons. Topped with buffalo sauced fried chicken with your choice of dressing.

flatbread_pizzas.name: Cheese
flatbread_pizzas.description: Our house pizza sauce topped with shredded mozzarella cheese.

flatbread_pizzas.name: Pepperoni
flatbread_pizzas.description: Our house pizza sauce topped with shredded mozzarella cheese and pepperoni.

flatbread_pizzas.name: Margherita (V)
flatbread_pizzas.description: Our twist on a classic - a thin, crispy crust topped with diced tomato, fresh tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

flatbread_pizzas.name: BBQ Bacon Chicken
flatbread_pizzas.description: Shredded mozzarella, grilled chicken, bacon, pickled jalapeños, sautéed onions, and drizzled BBQ sauce.

flatbread_pizzas.name: Supreme
flatbread_pizzas.description: Pepperoni, sausage, ham, diced red onion, diced tomato, black olives, green peppers and mushrooms.

flatbread_pizzas.name: Veggie
flatbread_pizzas.description: Ranch base, topped with grilled chicken, diced red onions, mozzarella cheese and drizzled buffalo sauce.

flatbread_pizzas.name: Pesto Basil (V)
flatbread_pizzas.description: Delicious shredded mozzarella cheese, pesto sauce, and fresh basil leaves.

bowls_and_plates.name: Granny’s Chili
bowls_and_plates.description: Topped with cheese, onion, and croutons | Add a grilled cheese for $3.00

bowls_and_plates.name: Rajun' Cajun' Mac & Cheese
bowls_and_plates.description: Queso mac with rajun cajun chicken breast, mixed with red onions, applewood smoked bacon, & topped with diced tomatoes and shredded cheese.

bowls_and_plates.name: Bourbon Sriracha Glazed Salmon Dinner
bowls_and_plates.description: Two 3oz salmon filets served with grilled corn on the cob and baby baked potatoes.

sandwiches.description: Grilled chicken cajun spiced and topped with spicy mayo.

sandwiches.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
sandwiches.description: A breast filet grilled to perfection and served with mayo.

sandwiches.name: BBQ Chicken Bacon Cheddar Sandwich

sandwiches.name: Granny's Buffalo Chicken Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Fried chicken sandwich tossed in buffalo sauce and topped with our spicy ranch and pickles | Add your choice of cheese for $1.00

sandwiches.name: The Granville Pub Fish & Chips
sandwiches.description: Half pound fried cod served with lettuce, tomato, pickles, and onions. Comes with tarter sauce or house made spicy ranch.

sandwiches.name: Salmon BLT
sandwiches.description: Two 3oz salmon filets served on grilled Texas toast and choice of house made garlic aioli or bourbon sriracha.

sandwiches.name: Granny's Club Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Our triple decker club with house smoked turkey and ham, apple wood smoked bacon, American cheese, honey dijon mustard and mayo.

sandwiches.name: Turkey Bourbon Bacon Jam Sandwich
sandwiches.description: House smoked turkey and applewood smoked bacon. Topped with house made bourbon bacon jam, homemade coleslaw, and cheddar cheese.

sandwiches.name: Chicken Wrap
sandwiches.description: Grilled or fried chicken breast in a spinach wrap with shredded cheese served with our house made sauce.

sandwiches.name: Granny’s Hot Wrap
sandwiches.description: Tomato basil wrap with 2 chicken tenders tossed in bourbon sriracha sauce, house made slaw, and pickles.

sandwiches.name: Granny’s Cheesiest Grilled Cheese (V)
sandwiches.description: Cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, and grilled tomato slices stuffed between grilled Texas toast.

sandwiches.name: Veggie Wrap
sandwiches.description: Hummus, roasted red pepper, tomato, onion, mushroom, black olives, green peppers, lettuce, and your choice of dressing | Add feta cheese for $1.00

dessert.name: Lava Cake
dessert.description: Served with whipped cream and caramel. Serves two.

items.name: Eggs Your Way
items.description: 2 eggs, breakfast potatoes, and 2 pieces of toast | Add 2 pieces of apple wood smoked bacon $2

items.name: Omelette Your Way
items.description: 3 egg omelette with a side of breakfast potatoes | Each topping $1 | Smother in chili $2 | Topping Selection: Ham, Bacon, Sausage, Shredded Cheese, Green Peppers, Onions, Tomatoes, Black Olives, Mushrooms

items.description: Scrambled eggs, breakfast potatoes, dice tomatoes, dice red onion, shredded cheese | Add ham or bacon $2
